title: Zuckerberg launches Facebook's Washington defense
text:
Zuckerberg launches Facebook's Washington defense Monday, April 09, 2018 - 02:16 
Facebook Chief Executive Officer Mark Zuckerberg held private meetings with some U.S. lawmakers on Monday, a day before he is due to appear at Congressional hearings over a political consultancy’s use of customer data and Russian attempts to sway 2016 elections. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Facebook Chief Executive Officer Mark Zuckerberg held private meetings with some U.S. lawmakers on Monday, a day before he is due to appear at Congressional hearings over a political consultancy’s use of customer data and Russian attempts to sway 2016 elections.
